channel.title: Growth Stocks on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Growth Stocks on FinanClub

item.title: TOST
item.description: score:398 Chances: The past few years have been a non-stop thrill ride for Toast (NYSE: TOST) investors. Despite the macroeconomic headwinds, Toast has continued to execute on its mandate to transform the restaurant industry with technology. You wouldn’t know it by looking at the stock price, but the business has continued to thrive, expanding its customer base, increasing sales, and paring its losses.

item.title: SE
item.description: score:92 Chances: Growth stock investors could be in for an excellent year in 2024. Sea’s estimated fair value is US$73.00 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity. The retail sector has faced multiple challenges in the current year, but the valuation of some of the best retail stocks looks attractive.

item.title: NFLX
item.description: score:115 Chances: Netflix (NFLX) stock has continued its robust rally off its mid-2022 lows. With Squid Game: The Challenge reality series leaning on the strength of its impressive Squid Game franchise and new plans for its video game business, it’s hard not to feel better about the company’s growth story moving into 2024.
